name: Breeze
author: Yassine Qoraiche
description: Breeze is the default Laravel starter kit and admin panel theme for Larapeak, designed to help you launch SaaS applications faster. It includes a clean and responsive layout built with Tailwind CSS, along with all the essential pages such as dashboard, billing, settings, authentication, and user management. Fully integrated with Laravelâ€™s features, Breeze provides a solid foundation for building modern SaaS platforms right out of the box.
